title: Whole Team Dc'd, While other team was fine?
body:
{{item:3070}} We were playing a team ranked and our whole team dc'd while the other team killed us? Apparently it wasn't only happening to us.



(Update) - Has seemed to stop for now

replies.body: Same here, 2 games in a row. First game my whole team dc'd except me. Second game both team had problems but the enemy team had more disconnections.

> [{quoted}](name=Tyf0x,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jBTNYffG,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-02-03T09:54:58.477+0000)
>
> Same here, 2 games in a row. First game my whole team dc'd except me. Second game both team had problems but the enemy team had more disconnections.

ITS YOU.
In ranked game, atm im dcing so is 3 other people, better be loss prevented, if its not im be pissed
Try being matched with a 4 man pre made squad who are all playing at the same house and decide. Let's shet on this loner and do 4 man disconnects.
Just started another game and we all lost connection in the loading screen :/
SAME {{summoner:3}}
another game here as well, 4 of us are dced, enemy team are fine{{summoner:3}}
SAME HERE
Rest in peace {{champion:64}} : did not see it coming

> [{quoted}](name=ZedLife,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jBTNYffG,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-03T09:45:54.234+0000)
>
> {{item:3070}} We were playing a team ranked and our whole team dc'd while the other team killed us? Apparently it wasn't only happening to us.
> 
> 
> 
> (Update) - Has seemed to stop for now

dats cool
I cri evritim

Being at plat 1 99poinits and having the server dcing on me on my first ranked game of the day sucks but  the other not disconnected jungler coming and killing me in the jungle while i dc sucks even more. The worst of all I didn't even get loss prevention and neither did the other guy in my team who also disconnected 5 times during the 20 minute game before surrendering. If it's ddosing thing again, and if you find those responsible,  burn them but before that burn all their %%%%ing computers.  {{summoner:14}}
Your gold m8

same problem, just lost a placement game from it T_T. enemy amumu kept dcing at the exact same times I would, it's definitely on Riot's end because he's from NZ and I'm from AUS... completely different ISP's.
someone said in game they checked reddit and there getting ddos'd

Everyone DC'd in mine. Game was over, apparently, because I can requeue.
Rito pls.
was this about 15-20 minutes ago ?
Been happening for the last 25 min
not even loss prevented ty riot. Free wins for other team always happens to me from afks and noobs, but now server dc. Thanks very much riot.

I'd also like to know what the heck is going on. In the last 30 minutes or so, there have been random dc's every few minutes. I was playing an aram and about 4 people (over both teams) dc'd at the same time. It's still happening now as well. Is there some maintenance they're doing that I don't know about or are the servers just a little buggy at the moment???

It's happening on my game as well, although just for a normal instead of ranked. The entire game I've had 300-2000 ms of ping, two other teammates as well as two people on the enemy team are also complaining of something similar.
